summary: Just adds a little to the town to make it look better but still be lore friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Just adds a little flora to the town. It isn't supposed to be a huge or super noticeable change, just look better and still look lore friendly. 

Added: Trees, shrubbery, harvestables, some decorations, and more lights 
Removed: So many leaves, weeds, some rocks 

If you see any problems like NPCs getting caught on items or during quests, please let me know right away and I'll do my best to fix it. 

Please let me know any suggestions you have regarding either what else to do with this mod or what town I should work on next. 

Other Towns:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57368]Spruced Up Whiterun[/url]﻿
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=302950904]Spruced Up Riften (Steam)[/url]
author: Silver Nox
